item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Download my PGP.asc (.txt) and use it. pub rsa2048 2022-12-27 [SCEA] D88D9970E9B382B971168B5ED4B3BBFCA4C677CD uid Alefvanoon <avn@disroot.org> sub rsa2048 2022-12-27 [SEA] Also if youâ€™re using UNIX-like operating systems you can add my key with this command: curl 'https://alef.tokhmi.xyz/pgp.asc' | gpg --import
